title: Decoding Biases: An Analysis of Automated Methods and Metrics for Gender Bias Detection in Language Models
details: SH Kumar, S Sahay, S Mazumder, E Okur… - … GenAI: What Can We Learn from …
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) have excelled at language understanding and generating human-level text. However, even with supervised training and human alignment, these LLMs are susceptible to adversarial attacks where malicious users …
